title: Reactive Messaging with RabbitMQ and WildFly
content: In the third article of this series, we will learn how to configure RabbitMQ as broker for a Reactive Application running on WildFly. We will show which are the changes we need to apply both on Rabbit MQ and on the Reactive Application to make them work together smoothly. Pre-requisites: Configuring Rabbit MQ to run ...  The post appeared first on .
